summary: "Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind" is a 2004 American sci-fi romance movie directed by Michel Gondry. It stars Jim Carrey and Kate Winslet as a couple who decide to erase their memories of each other after breaking up. The film explores the power of love and memory through a unique story structure and fun visual effects. Critics and audiences loved it, and it won an Academy Award for its script. Many musicians have been inspired by the film, creating songs and albums with titles referencing it.
title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
